group.headline: Steamtoid. The Destructoid Steam Group!
group.summary:
This is the land of ash-holes and tyre-ants.. our rule system is dynamic and not set in stone, for we ran out of stone stoning the stoners. We are zionists. We are the drunk children who tell dirty jokes to your Uncles. Havent played any CP Games from 1980-2002? GTFO. You got some tats? Show that shit or GTFO.

Enjoy your stay :D <3 - Steamtoid Socialist Party

group.headline: The Future's Bright, The Future's Fragmasters
group.summary:
FRAGMASTERS TALKING FORUMS
http://www.fragmasters.co.uk

Sponsors:
SAPPHIRE Technology (Head Sponsor)
Bullguard, Multiplay UK, Aliens Stole My Console


Fragmasters Premier eSports Gaming Community welcomes everyone who visits our site and/or plays on our game servers. We value our visitors and members and try to improve the experience for all by implementing feedback we receive from the community.

Get signed up to the forum! By doing so, you get the chance to take part in exclusive events and also periodic community matches against other gaming organisations. You also get to access banter, help topics, general everyday discussion and you can get your idea's and feedback across to us.

Become a VIP? Donating to Fragmasters grants you a special VIP pass as a 'thank you' which enables you to gain access to special benefits on EVERY one of our servers.

group.headline: Facepunch Studios!
group.summary: The only OFFICIAL Facepunch Studios group.

group.headline: Making TF2 Better
group.summary:
The Hampshire Heavies is one of the largest independent TF2 communities in the UK. We have members throughout the UK and Europe.

We promote team work and balanced gameplay in a fun and respectful environment on our own dedicated servers. We encourage everyone to get involved, as well as taking part in our regularly hosted community events. We also offer open admin to members of our community on selected servers (sign up on our website for details)

So join us, get involved and have a laugh! There is always some event or something new and interesting coming up on the |H|H| horizon.

We also have 2 league teams, -HH- & -HHÂ²-, which are both active in all major european leagues. -HH- is currently in ETF2L division 3 and -HHÂ²- is in ETF2L division 3.

Hampshire Heavies Tags
|H|H| ~ The Hampshire Heavies Core Community
-HH- ~ The Hampshire Heavies 1st League Team
-HHÂ²- ~ The Hampshire Heavies 2nd League Team
@H|H ~ The Hampshire Heavies Community Regulars

We have 5 TF2 public servers, all running HLStats & map voting, which you can find at

HH1.THEHH.CO.UK:27015 - 24 slots TF2
HH2.THEHH.CO.UK:27015 - 24 slots TF2
HH3.THEHH.CO.UK:27035 - 20 slots TF2
HH4.THEHH.CO.UK:27045 - 24 slots TF2 - No Crits
HH5.THEHH.CO.UK:27055 - 24 slots TF2 - Reg Admin

Check the links below and apply for the @H|H tag and admin on HH5.

group.headline: Control Point: A TF2 Podcast
group.summary: Producing quality Team Fortress 2 podcasts since 1927. Brought to you by the Dead Workers Party.

group.headline: The Afraid of Monsters Group
group.summary:
Welcome to the Afraid of Monsters Group!

Are you ready for the horror? Are you ready for the blood? For the screams of help? For you to die?!





Afraid of Monsters: Director's Cut

This modification is one of the most popular horror modifications made to Half-Life 1!
You can play it in single-player or play it in Sven Co-op (another Half-Life modification), only on Ice Blue's server!

The game has 4 endings, but only one of them, gives you peace. The other 3 are parts of the bad ending.
2 of the endings have been included to the Sven Co-op version.
The 4th ending can be seen by entering the special "Code" that is formed by 10 numbers!

Many have tried to find the code, but... only the best have found it!

Are you one of them?


The original Afraid of Monsters is also playable in Sven Co-op, you cannot host Director's Cut by yourself, but you can host the original one!

You can download the original Afraid of Monsters maps for Sven Co-op by following the link below.

group.headline: TF2 in a nutshell
group.summary: Team FortressÂ® 2 (TF2) is the sequel to the game that put class-based, multiplayer team warfare on the map. Play as the flame-throwing Pyro, the room clearing Heavy, or the Spy, a master of disguises. Other classes include: Scout, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, Demoman, or Soldier.

group.headline: The Team Fortress 2 Podkast
group.summary:
Everything TF2 is brought together for the weekly KritzKast podcast.

Updates, releases, maps, mods, fan content and far more than you'd think one little FPS should generate. Join us for the live recordings, every Sunday at 8pm (London, UK Time) www.kritzkast.com/live or download the episodes to listen to at your leasure.

Get all the info on www.kritzkast.com and stick your pin in the map on our fan page.

Yay! KritzKast have our own servers now.
They have been supplied by Clanplanet.co.uk
Http://www.kritzkast.com/servers
for a complete servers list and discount codes

group.headline: 1â¬ â 1$ / Steam Unpowered
group.summary:
This group started out to show people were against the very unbalanced prices that came with the currency change on Steam. Right now this group will focus on exposing all the flaws around the Steam platform in the hope it would eventually lead to improvement.

The group will keep the original name to show how this all started, only our goals have expanded.

==========================
Steam Unpowered IRC Channel:
Server: irc.quakenet.org
Channel: #steamunpowered
http://webchat.quakenet.org/
==========================

The original Steam forum thread:
http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=770231

group.summary: Za sve Srbe koji igraju Left4Dead 1 i 2, i druge antizombi nastrojene igre.

group.headline: L4D2
group.summary:
Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008.

This co-operative action horror FPS takes you and your friends through the cities, swamps and cemeteries of the Deep South, from Savannah to New Orleans across five expansive campaigns.

group.headline: Oh god ._.
group.summary:
My personal group for me, my friends, past friends, clan members, fans etc...

About me? My name is Sean Clark and I live in Britain in a large town/small city called Milton Keynes. I was born on July 10th 1993 in London, I moved to Milton Keynes in 1996 when I was 3 years old.

I'm currently running a gaming community and also enrolling at Milton Keynes Colledge.

People who I'd most personally want to meet in real life would be Obama and Gabe.

If you wish to know anything else about me just read my steam profile.

group.headline: Team Fortress 2's "Valuable Community Contributors"
group.summary: Trying to get everyone together in one place.

group.headline: Zombie Apocalypse in co-operative horror FPS!
group.summary:
L4D you and your fellow survivors battle thousands of swarming zombies as you travel across rooftops of an abandoned metropolis, rural ghost towns and pitch-black forests.

L4D2 youâll play as one of four new survivors through the cities, swamps and cemeteries of the Deep South. With a wide and devastating array of classic and upgraded weapons. Youâll also get a chance to take out some aggression on infected with a variety of melee weapons, from chainsaws to axes and even the deadly frying pan.

group.summary:

Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter the highly anticipated sequel, the game continues your battle against Mentalâs army with the classic over-the-top action & crazy humor.

Serious Sam 2: 45 new enemys to face. The Serious Sam series is known for its outrageous enemy personalities, and Serious Sam 2 will give you a lot more to laugh about.

group.headline: .:: L4D2 Serbian Community ::.
group.summary:
Zelite da kupite L4D2 po steam ceni, a nemate kreditnu karticu?

Mi cemo to uciniti umesto Vas!

Dovoljno je da uplatite "nn"â¬ u din protivrednosti na nas racun i mi cemo Vam poslati L4D2 kao poklon preko steama ili na Vas mail.

Sve sto ostaje do Vas, nakon sto downloadujete L4D2, je da se udobno zavalite u fotelju i igrate se zajedno sa nama.

Sve informacije oko nabavke L4D2 mozete dobiti na mail:

l4d2.serbia@hotmail.com

VAZNA NAPOMENA: Poruke sa ovog maila su JEDINE MERODAVNE, sve ostale poruke sa drugih mailova od NN korisnika su FAKE, i nemojte sluchajno slati novac!

VAZNA NAPOMENA: Broj kopija je ogranicen, jer smo limitirani "anti fraud" sistemom valve-a tj. samo odredjen broj kopija moze sa jedne kreditne kartice, cisto obavestenje, kome se ne zuri moze da ostane bez kopije. Poz

AP Team

group.headline: [WDZ]
group.summary:
Everyone is welcome! Tag up with [WDZ] in front of your name!

Consider donating to Weekdayz for some in-game benefits, or to be an admin see here: http://wdzclan.com/donate

The Weekdayz Community is a large online community dedicated to gaming. As a community, we started off with Team Fortress 2, and we're starting expand out to other games. If you would like to join the massive WDZ army's quest to take over the gaming world, join and support us by wearing our tag [WDZ] to let people know that you're a part of the most kick-ass community ever.

group.headline: Intel Rockstars Clan Public Steam Group
group.summary:
Intel Rockstars is a gaming clan focused on playing competitively while having fun. We formed this community in the hopes of creating an enjoyable gaming experience for all; whether you're a tagged [IR*] member or just visiting one of our servers, we want you to feel like you belong. If you play Bad Company 2, StarCraft 2, Lead & Gold or Killing Floor come by our servers and check us out, we promise you'll have a great time!

If you're interested in becoming a part of [IR*] we're always looking for dedicated members, click the apply link below and join the ranks of the rockstars!

group.headline: Super Nifty: When this group hits 88mph your going to see some serious shit!
group.summary:
Welcome to Super Nifty's Steam Group!

We're a community that enjoys gaming, hanging out and occasional competitive playing. We enjoy games of all types from NES days to the games of today! Find more about us @ www.supernifty.org



Interested in joining? Follow these simple steps!
+Add us on steam and favorite our servers if you wish.
+Visit supernifty.org and register on our forums so we get to know you!
+Fill out the mini app and slap the sN. tag to your name!

group.headline: Official TF2B Fangroup

TF2B is a web-based Backpack viewer for Team Fortress 2, developed by Athernar, n00berific, Shugo and Pilk. We strive to make TF2B the best and most feature-rich Backpack-viewing experience possible.

TF2B for Android was developed by Hideous.

group.headline: L4D2 Gameplay Commentaries YouTube
group.summary:
Hey everyone this is a group dedicated to all those channels on YouTube of people who record and commentate L4D and L4D2 gameplay videos.

I have recently started my own L4D2 YouTube Gameplay Commentary channel and would really appreciate it if you guys checked it out!

So if you have a channel you would like advertised as well join the group and post a comment and I'll put up a link to your channel.

Also join the group if you're a fan of the videos and the channels and we can keep you updated via announcements and you can post your love. Haha.

Thanks!

group.headline: Nitrate Gaming Is now Live
group.summary:
Here at Nitrate Gaming, we believe in fun, fair, and competitive online interaction. Our goal is to re-enforce positive game play with developing and mature adults through direct community management. We provide our community and clan members with the tools and direction to improve themselves and those around them. By being an integral part of the community, we are able to gauge daily requirements of our members and facilitate change as needed.

group.headline: iRunner 'n' Ian's Hat raffle Group
group.summary:
This raffle group is created to... what else? Give away hats for the people who want them!

Q: How can I participate in the raffle?
R: Well, my good man/woman, all you need is a reclaimed metal to participate; And also join the Raffles Group and post in the announcement of the hat you want!.

Q: What will you do with the metal?
R: That's a silly question, I will use this metal to make more hats for the raffle of course.

Q: How will this work?
R: I'll throw papers into my hat with the users' name on them, I'll pick one and the one I picked will be the proud winner of a sweet random hat!

Q: What happens when you make a raffle and you don't get enough metal for the next raffle?
R: I will personally add metal from my part to complete the craft, my good friend.

Q: What are you winning from all of this?
R: The feeling of helping others get the precious hats they want, isn't that right?

If you have more question I'll gladly reply... to most of them anyways.


Ian's Part

iRunner's Glorious Hat Raffle Thread V1 *with some help from Ian*

The Concept
iRunner has decided to give a special hat away to a lucky winner of this raffle! The trading system has brought iRunner's charity to the great participants of this here event.

Questions

Q: How do I participate?
A: Well it's very simple, place a reclaimed into this account when trading comes out and you've signed into the raffle. Your name has a chance to be drawn on *date* for the great hat that iRunner has set up for this raffle.

Q: Why do we need *metal* to participate?
A: iRunner collects hats, as we all know, so he can't give his own hats he worked hard to get. The *metals* used in this raffle will be used to create a new hat which will be used to give away in the next raffle.

Q: What if he crafts a bad hat?
A: That depends on your opinions, someone could like the hat that he crafted a lot. You could either leave said person be, and let the hat go to him, or you could enter the raffle for a chance to add a hat to your collection.

Q: What do we do if we want to draw out of the raffle?
A: You can back out any time, just send iRunner or myself if you want to draw out of the raffle.

NOTE

THERE ARE NO REFUNDS, IF YOU DRAW OUT OF THE RAFFLE, THE METAL IS YOUR LOSS.

I mean it IS just reclaimed metal anyway.

Now that's it for the OP, feel free to enter the raffle early by PM'ing me or iRunner.

Owners:
lionheart1066

Super Admins:
Awede

Developers:
Dash
Shadow

|TBNGC.co.uk| VS Saxton Hale : 94.23.158.232:27019
|TBNGC.co.uk| VS Saxton Hale â2 : 94.23.158.230:27017
source-games.de vs. SAXTON HALE : 193.192.58.82:27060
BattleBad.net| VS Saxton Hale - Chicago : 68.232.173.195:27015
BattleBad.net|VS Saxton Hale - DALLAS : 68.232.164.109:27015
BattleBad.net|VS Saxton Hale - London, UK : 217.163.30.128:27015

It is a new fun gamemod for TF2. Now it is under heavy developing and we have some servers running it.
This mod is planned to be realesed.

Every player becomes by order,
a Saxon Hale, the head of Mann. Co.
and the supplier of weapons to the mercenaries of TF2.
Others should try to kill him or cap the point.

Hale is unusually strong.
But he does not use weapons, because
he believes that problems should be
solved with bare hands and brute force.

Of course Saxton Hale has some special abilities:
1. Hale's Super-jump - Crouch, look up, then stand up.
2. Hale's Rage that scares enemies and disables sentry guns for 5 seconds - Taunt when rage meter is full.


This mod is created by Dr.Eggman, he is the main creator and the developer of this mod.

The group avatar by The Drunk Demoman.

group.headline: Backpack Milestones
group.summary:
A group founded by Nerfed.

This group's goal is to gather everyone who has completed a goal that draws people's attention to their backpack. Whether's its collecting 200 of the same item, collecting every hat in TF2, or even just having a lot of shit!

If your backpack is an eye magnet for attention, ask for an invite! Because you belong here!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What makes us so special?

Nerfed: http://www.tf2b.com/?id=vanillascout
(Lots of Scatterguns!)

Keychain: http://www.tf2b.com/?id=ikey
(1 of every hat!)

Ruskeydoo: http://tf2b.com/?id=Ruskeydoo
(Sandviches level 1-100!)

carcinoGeneticist: http://www.tf2b.com/?id=SoldiersStashes
